languages.text: Спокойствие варп-перелета было нарушено призывами о помощи: на одной из складочных палуб творится что-то жуткое. Уже два отряда, отправленных на разведку, пропали без следа... увы, единственный способ узнать их судьбу — личный визит Вольного Торговца и {mf|его|ее} свиты...

A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.
languages.original_text: Спокойствие варп-перелета было нарушено призывами о помощи: на одной из складочных палуб творится что-то жуткое. Уже два отряда, отправленных на разведку, пропали без следа... увы, единственный способ узнать их судьбу — личный визит Вольного Торговца и {mf|его|ее} свиты...

traits.locale_text: A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.

A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.

A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.

languages.text: 一条呼救讯息打破了风平浪静的亚空间航行：某个储藏甲板出现了某种邪恶的东西，已经有两支小队被了过去，调查此事，但他们都失去了联系。遗憾的是，若是想知晓他们的命运，唯一的方法就是让行商浪人带领{mf|他的|她的}随行人员，亲自前往那片区域。
languages.original_text: A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: 一条呼救讯息打破了风平浪静的亚空间航行：某个储藏甲板出现了某种邪恶的东西，已经有两支小队被了过去，调查此事，但他们都失去了联系。遗憾的是，若是想知晓他们的命运，唯一的方法就是让行商浪人带领{mf|他的|她的}随行人员，亲自前往那片区域。

languages.text: Una llamada de auxilio ha interrumpido la tranquilidad de un vuelo sin incidentes por la disformidad: algo malvado se acerca a una de las bodegas de carga. Ya han mandado a dos equipos a investigarlo, pero ambos han desaparecido. La única forma de averiguar su paradero es visitando {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente y a su séquito.
languages.original_text: A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Una llamada de auxilio ha interrumpido la tranquilidad de un vuelo sin incidentes por la disformidad: algo malvado se acerca a una de las bodegas de carga. Ya han mandado a dos equipos a investigarlo, pero ambos han desaparecido. La única forma de averiguar su paradero es visitando {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente y a su séquito.

languages.text: <歪み>の中を何事もなく飛行していると、助けを求める声がその静けさを突き破った。倉庫デッキのひとつで何か不穏な事態が起きている。すでに部隊が2つ調査に駆り出されているが、いずれも行方が分からない。あいにく、彼らの行く末を突き止めるには、自由開拓者とその従者が直々にその場所を訪れる他ない。
languages.original_text: A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: <歪み>の中を何事もなく飛行していると、助けを求める声がその静けさを突き破った。倉庫デッキのひとつで何か不穏な事態が起きている。すでに部隊が2つ調査に駆り出されているが、いずれも行方が分からない。あいにく、彼らの行く末を突き止めるには、自由開拓者とその従者が直々にその場所を訪れる他ない。

languages.text: Un appel de détresse vient perturber le calme d'un trajet dans le Warp des plus paisibles... Il se passe quelque chose de sinistre sur l'un des ponts de stockage. Malheureusement, les deux équipes chargées d'inspecter les lieux n'ont toujours pas donné de nouvelles, et il semble que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'ait d'autre choix que d'aller vérifier avec son entourage ce qui se trame.
languages.original_text: A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Un appel de détresse vient perturber le calme d'un trajet dans le Warp des plus paisibles... Il se passe quelque chose de sinistre sur l'un des ponts de stockage. Malheureusement, les deux équipes chargées d'inspecter les lieux n'ont toujours pas donné de nouvelles, et il semble que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'ait d'autre choix que d'aller vérifier avec son entourage ce qui se trame.

languages.text: Ein Hilferuf hat die Stille eines ereignislosen Warpflugs durchbrochen: Auf einem der Lagerdecks ist etwas Düsteres im Gange. Zwei Trupps wurden bereits ausgeschickt, um Nachforschungen anzustellen, und beide sind verschwunden. Leider lässt sich nur durch einen persönlichen Besuch {mf|des Freihändlers und seines|der Freihändlerin und ihres} Gefolges in Erfahrung bringen, was aus ihnen geworden ist.
languages.original_text: A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.

Zwei Trupps wurden bereits ausgeschickt, um Nachforschungen anzustellen, und beide sind verschwunden. languages.text: Sakin geçen bir öte uçuşunun dinginliği, bir yardım çağrısıyla bozuldu: Depo güvertelerinden birinde feci bir şeyler oluyor. Durumu araştırmak için iki ekip gönderildi ancak her ikisinden de haber alınamıyor. Ne yazık ki akıbetlerini öğrenmenin tek yolu, Hür Tacir'in ve maiyetinin bizzat olaya müdahale etmesi.
languages.original_text: A call for help has pierced the tranquillity of an uneventful warp flight: something sinister is afoot on one of the storage decks. Two squads have already been sent to investigate, and both of them have gone missing. Alas, the only way to learn of their fate is a personal visit by the Rogue Trader and {mf|his|her} retinue.
